description.oldValue:
When receiving a new one-on-one chat from an external user, Teams users will now see an invitation to accept or block the external user. This also provides the ability to block external users at any point, which revokes access to presence and incoming messages.
GA date: August CY2022
description.newValue:
When receiving a new one-on-one
chat from an external user, Teams users will now see an invitation to
accept or block the external user. This also provides
the ability to block external users at any point, which revokes access to
presence and incoming messages.
